content: **this pattern is available for free on my website visit pattern website link above or you can download it here on ravelry as a printable ad-free pdf** **difficulty ** advanced **materials needed ** approx 200 yards of #10 crochet thread in color of your choice pictured is artiste cotton thread in peach blossom available for purchase from hobby lobby 1 5 mm 7 steel hook scissors yarn needle stitch markers 1 yard of 5/8 ribbon it will bunch up if you don t want your ribbon to bunch try using 3/8 **stitches used ** chain = chain single_crochet = single_crochet half_double_crochet = half_double_crochet double_crochet = double_crochet fpsc = front post single_crochet bpsc = back post single_crochet decrease = single_crochet 2 together **additional terms ** blo = back loop only flo = front loop only 5 double_crochet shell = 5 double_crochet in designated stitch 9 double_crochet shell = 9 double_crochet in designated chain space fan = double_crochet chain 1 in next 8 double_crochet 1 double_crochet in last double_crochet of shell v_stitch = double_crochet chain 1 double_crochet in same stitch cluster = decrease in same stitch **measurements ** 3-6 months 5 front to back 6 1/2 tall at tallest point with plenty of stretch **gauge ** measures 1 3/4 across after round 5
